articles.title: Ex-Obama advisor says more Palestinian kids should die in Islamophobic rant - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: ‘If we killed 4,000 Palestinian kids, it wasn’t enough,’ says former diplomat Stuart Seldowitz in one video.
articles.content:
A former senior US official is facing a backlash after harassing a halal food vendor in New York.
Stuart Seldowitz, who previously served as deputy director of the United States Department of States… [+3045 chars]
